plugins.name: BartTextToDesignNow
plugins.description:
I’m excited to share a new Figma plugin I’ve been working on. It’s still in the early stages, but the idea is simple and powerful: you can describe what you want to see, and the plugin will draw it for you. I’m really thankful for any support or feedback you can offer as I continue to develop it.


At the moment, the plugin is focused on basic shapes. For example, you could type, "Draw a rectangle, 450 width, 600 height, 45 stroke size, red stroke color, yellow fill color," and the plugin will generate that exact shape on your canvas. The key is to keep your instructions straightforward and precise.


To help you along the way, the plugin provides helpful hints at the bottom of the screen as you type your commands. This should make it easier to craft the right instruction and get the results you’re looking for.


If you make a mistake or want to adjust something, you can use the "Previous" command to go back to the last command you entered. This allows you to easily refine your design without starting from scratch.


This plugin is just getting started, so your feedback and support are crucial as I continue to improve and add more features. Thank you for trying it out!

accepted.name: Bartosz
accepted.description:
I love to design UI for mobile and desktop . 

Check out my website : 
https://gagarindes.myportfolio.com/

gagarindes@gmail.com

I am available for hire .

plugins.tagline: Write It, See It – Plugindesigns Transforms Your Words into Stunning Figma Designs!

98507.name: BartTextToDesignNow
98507.description:
I’m excited to share a new Figma plugin I’ve been working on. It’s still in the early stages, but the idea is simple and powerful: you can describe what you want to see, and the plugin will draw it for you. I’m really thankful for any support or feedback you can offer as I continue to develop it.


At the moment, the plugin is focused on basic shapes. For example, you could type, "Draw a rectangle, 450 width, 600 height, 45 stroke size, red stroke color, yellow fill color," and the plugin will generate that exact shape on your canvas. The key is to keep your instructions straightforward and precise.


To help you along the way, the plugin provides helpful hints at the bottom of the screen as you type your commands. This should make it easier to craft the right instruction and get the results you’re looking for.


If you make a mistake or want to adjust something, you can use the "Previous" command to go back to the last command you entered. This allows you to easily refine your design without starting from scratch.


This plugin is just getting started, so your feedback and support are crucial as I continue to improve and add more features. Thank you for trying it out!
98507.tagline: Write It, See It – Plugindesigns Transforms Your Words into Stunning Figma Designs!

plugins.name: Bulk Remove Variants
plugins.description:
This plugin can be used to bulk remove specific variants of a component set. Select one or many component sets that share property names, then define the variant names you wish to remove.


This plugin was originally created for bulk removing variants from an icon set.
plugins.tagline: Bulk remove specific variants of a ComponentSet

138081.name: Bulk Remove Variants
138081.description:
This plugin can be used to bulk remove specific variants of a component set. Select one or many component sets that share property names, then define the variant names you wish to remove.


This plugin was originally created for bulk removing variants from an icon set.
138081.tagline: Bulk remove specific variants of a ComponentSet

plugins.name: Storyboard Tool
plugins.description:
Quickly lay out storyboards right inside Figma. Just select your images, set your board and page options, and let the plugin do the heavy lifting—layouts, numbering, and titles all handled for you. You can tweak grid, page size, fonts, colors, image fades, and more. Everything’s flexible. Perfect for film, animation, or any kind of visual storytelling. No manual grid wrangling, just fast, clean, customizable boards every time.


---


There are some limitations with the plugin such as font selection (currently a text field vs. dropdown) and others. There might be some new development on this but not guaranteed!
plugins.tagline: Easily create storyboard pages for presentation

138170.tagline: Easily create storyboard pages for presentation

plugins.name: コーディング計算ツール
plugins.description:
レイヤーから取得できる数値をコーディングで使用する数値に自動計算します。

あなたのコーディング作業が少しでも楽になりますように。


【行間の倍率変換】

テキストレイヤーを選択すると文字サイズと行間を取得して倍率値に変換します。

以下の場合は計算できません。


- 行間がautoの場合

- オートレイアウト、グループ化レイヤーを選択

- テキストレイヤー以外のレイヤーを選択


【単位変換】

px値を別の単位に変換します。

各単位共通でテキストレイヤーなら文字サイズを取得し、その他のレイヤーなら横幅を取得しますが、単位ごとに連動するフィールドが異なります。


em：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」が変動します。


rem：

レイヤーを選択すると「変換したいpx値」が変動します。基準値は16が初期値になります。


%：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」が変動します。


vw：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」と「変換したいpx値」が変動します。

「基準値」は一番外側のフレームサイズになり、「変換したいpx値」は選択中のレイヤーの数値になります。


【clamp関数】

CSSでそのまま使えるclamp関数の値を生成します。

フレームサイズが700px以下の場合は最小値と最小画面幅が、701px以上だと最大値と最大画面幅が連動し、レイヤーから数値を取得します。

emとremは基準値も設定できます。


【その他共通仕様】

- 結果をクリックでクリップボードにコピーします。

- 「値変動」をOFFにするとレイヤーからの取得をやめ、普通の計算機になります。

- 出力結果が小数点になる場合は少数第3位まで表示します。
plugins.tagline: コーディングで使用する数値に変換する補助ツール。

plugins.name: Chat IO
plugins.description:
AI-Powered Chat Interface

- Interactive AI Assistant : Chat with an AI that analyzes your selected Figma content (text layers, frames, components)

- Context-Aware Responses : The AI understands your selected design elements and provides relevant feedback

- Multi-language Support : Automatically detects and responds in the user's language

- Conversation Memory : Maintains context between messages for coherent discussions


Smart Text Replacement System

- AI-Driven Content Generation : Replace selected text layers with AI-generated content based on custom instructions

- Multiple Layer Support : Handle single or multiple text layers simultaneously

- Pre-built Templates : Quick-access buttons for common tasks:

- Summarize : Condense text content concisely

- Improve Text : Enhance clarity, reduce repetition, fix sentence structure

- Improve CTA : Optimize call-to-action buttons following UX best practices

- Task Generator : Convert project descriptions into actionable to-do lists
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma plugin for intelligent content generation and design feedback using LLM API.

plugins.name: Data Grid Master
plugins.description:
Apply full spreadsheets to any data grid of your choice in Figma within seconds.

Data Grid Master supports CSV uploads or copy-paste from Excel, Google Sheets, or any spreadsheet tool.

Just pick a single cell in your grid, let the plugin find all other cells that match it and select the property to modify if it is a component. Text nodes are set directly.

Choose whether to upload a CSV file or paste your spreadsheet data, hit apply — done.


Tested with AG Grid, MUI-X Data Grid, and many others — works with any professional data grid setup.

The only requirement: cells must share the same name in Figma.


Full tutorial is available here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L9baIywE7JE

accepted.name: Evgenii Shmoish
accepted.description: UX designer at day, developer at night

plugins.tagline: Apply spreadsheets to data grids in 3 easy steps. Supports component properties and text nodes.

plugins.name: 📝 Text Export / Import (JSON)
plugins.description: Easily export all text layers from your Figma designs into a clean JSON format — and import them back just as smoothly. Export from selected frames or the entire document, with options to include or skip locked layers. Perfect for localization, content updates, or developer handoff.
plugins.tagline: Text to JSON. JSON to Text. Simple.

136667.name: 📝 Text Export / Import (JSON)
136667.description: Easily export all text layers from your Figma designs into a clean JSON format — and import them back just as smoothly. Export from selected frames or the entire document, with options to include or skip locked layers. Perfect for localization, content updates, or developer handoff.
136667.release_notes:
UI Update:
The plugin interface is now cleaner and more user-friendly: instructions and selection info are clearly aligned and spaced, all main blocks have equal margins, and paddings are unified for a balanced look. The selection block stands out with a soft background and rounded corners, making export/import actions more intuitive and visually appealing.
136667.tagline: Text to JSON. JSON to Text. Simple.

plugins.name: Dynamic Typescales
plugins.description:
Dynamic Typescales


Automatically adjust tracking and leading across your typescale for better rhythm and readability. Tightens spacing for large text and loosens it for small text, with sliders to control intensity and inputs to set your base values. Say goodbye to tedious manual tweaking!


---


### Feedback & Support


I’d love to see what you create using this plugin!

Feel free to tag me or say hi on LinkedIn or Twitter.

Bug reports, ideas, or just a thumbs-up — all are welcome 🙏


---


Made by Tejas Nishad

If you like my work and want to support me: Buy Me a Coffee ☕


---


Links for the curious:

  1. Linkedin
  2. Twitter
  3. Instagram
  4. Portfolio
plugins.tagline: Perfect your type - adjust tracking and leading with ease.

plugins.name: SheetSync For DeSo
plugins.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Google Sheets to Figma Design Variations


SheetSync is a powerful Figma plugin that creates design variations directly from your Google Sheets data, saving you hours of repetitive work. Perfect for generating product catalogs, social media posts, campaign assets, and more.


With SheetSync, simply select a template frame, connect your Google Sheet, and watch as the plugin automatically generates variations with customized text and images. Text fields with "#" prefixes automatically populate from your sheet's columns, while image placeholders update with URLs from your data.


Key Features:

• Generate dozens of design variations in seconds

• Dynamic text population from spreadsheet data

• Automatic image placement from URL sources

• Simple template setup with intuitive naming conventions

• Manual image upload option for greater flexibility


Streamline your design workflow and ensure consistency across all your variations with SheetSync For DeSo.
plugins.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

131544.name: SheetSync For DeSo
131544.description:

131544.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

plugins.name: 文本样式映射助手 TextStyle Mapper
plugins.description:
介绍

本插件可帮助你在 Figma 中快捷地将选中元素的本地文本样式进行批量替换，无需手动一个个设置，提升效率，适用于多语言或版本样式替换场景。


功能说明

  1. 自动获取当前文件的本地文本样式
  2. 提供源样式与目标样式下拉选择
  3. 批量替换所选文本节点的样式
  4. 无本地样式时自动提示空状态


使用方法

  1. 打开插件后，插件会自动加载本地文本样式；
  2. 从两个下拉框中分别选择「源样式」与「目标样式」；
  3. 选中需要替换样式的文本节点，点击「开始替换」按钮；
  4. 替换完成后插件自动关闭。


注意事项

  1. 本插件仅支持本地文本样式替换，不支持团队样式库；
  2. 请确保当前文件中已有本地样式，否则将显示空状态；
  3. 请先选中需替换的文本图层再操作。


Introduction

This plugin helps you batch replace local text styles in Figma with just a few clicks. It's ideal for managing multilingual design systems or switching between style versions efficiently.


Function Description

  1. Automatically loads all local text styles from the current file
  2. Provides dropdowns to select source and target styles
  3. Replaces text styles for selected text nodes in bulk
  4. Shows an empty state message if no local styles exist


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin to load local text styles automatically;
  2. Select the source and target styles from the dropdowns;
  3. Select the text nodes you want to modify;
  4. Click the “Replace” button to apply the change.


Notes

  1. Only local text styles are supported (no team styles);
  2. The plugin will show an empty state if no local styles exist;
  3. Make sure to select text layers before using the plugin.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Batch replace local text styles with ease
